title: Sipz Fusion Cafe - North Park
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, Catering, Fusion, Vietnamese
description: Opened in December 2011, this is Sipz's second location; the other is in Claremont Mesa. Offers a range of Asian style rice and noodles plates, mockmeats, and appetizers. Everything is vegan except for one dish (noted on the menu). Vegan sushi menu is available from 5pm. Its own bakery makes vegan treats and desserts. Casual nice with large front windows.
